casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Brown, Attorney General, et al., v. Rhodes, Governor, et al.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Brown, v. Rhodes (1976), 46 Ohio St. 2d 33.]

(No. 75-199 —Decided April 21,1976.) Mr. William J. Brown, attorney general, Mr. Robert II. Olson, Jr., Mr. Thomas V. Martin and Mr. Peter D. Kinder, for relators. Messrs. Crabbe, Brown, Jones, Potts £ Schmidt, Mr. William L. Schmidt and Mr. Ira Owen Kane, for respondents. *34 Per Curiam.

In view of this court’s decision in Maloney v. Rhodes (1976), 45 Ohio St. 2d 319, the instant cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as being moot.

Cause dismissed.

O’Neill,, C. J., Herbert, Corrigan, Stern, Celebrezze, W. Brown and P. Brown, JJ., concur.
